title: Arose gabw nwng khwnasong
lyrics:
Arose gabw nwng khwnasong
Jwng sibiyw nwng khwnasong -2
Jwng rwjabbai thagwn nwngni khamsalia
Jwng nebai thagwn nwng fwifin jase
“Nwng langfa nangwn- jwngkhou langfanangwn” -2
(A)
Swithw dhwrwm khou jwng sibiyw
Jiuni derakhou jwng hastayw -2
“Nwng langfa nangwn- jwngkhou langfanangwn” -2
(B)
Fwthai nayao jwng khwose jarwnga
Sibinayao jwng gwsw hwrwnga -2
“Nwng langfa nangwn- jwngkhou langfanangwn” -2
